version_description: - bug fixes
Worldwide release.

- Chat!
- Improved AI.
- Bug fixes.
- Fixed crashes during gameplay

- Maximum player level increased to 50
- 7 new skills
- 14 new animals
- Maximum skill level increased to 12
- Cheaper health and attack attributes
- Improved stability and security

- Performance improvements.
- Joystick movement fix.
- Proper character descriptions.

- Team switch.
- Notifications on friend invites.
- Multiple friend system improvements.
-Bug fixes.

- Team switch.
- Notifications on friend invites.
- Multiple friend system improvements.

- 6 new maps.
- 60 new animals.
- Champions.
- Flying birds.
- Mini map.
- Radar improvements.
- Terrain visible on the radar.

- Improved water performance.
- Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

- 11 new Champions.
- 5 new Wolf Skins.

- Bug fixes.
- Anti-cheat improvements.
- Animal names and health are now visible on Low quality.
- Increased spawn rate on the last map.

-Daily Quests: Complete various missions to get rewards.
-Multiple translations with language selection available in settings.
-Chat message length limit increased significantly.
-Enabled system keyboard in gameplay.
-Fixed multiple bugs with animals that were stuck or invisible.
-Fixed rooms being treated as full too often.
-Removed forced advertisements.
-All types of animals for specific map are now available in every room on that map.
-Increased animal spawn rate in coop.
-Bug fixes.

- brand new map
- over 20 new animals to hunt
- 2 additional wolf skins

- Performance improvements.
- Quality level settings.

- 11 New Animals.
- 6 New Champions.
Network connection improvements.

New skill tree with 7 additional abilities:
- Freezing Trap
- Root Prison
- Shield Totem
- Healing Totem
- Swamp
- Explosion Trap
- Freezing Area Trap
Bug Fixes

- 11 New Animals.
- 6 New Champions.

- Performance improvements.
- Quality level settings.

- brand new map
- over 20 new animals to hunt
- 2 additional wolf skins

- Anti-cheat improvements.
- Animal names and health are now visible on Low quality.
- Increased spawn rate on the last map.

-Multiple translations with language selection available in settings.

-Enabled system keyboard in gameplay.

-Daily Quests: Complete various missions to get rewards.
-Multiple translations with language selection available in settings.
-Chat message length limit increased significantly.
-Enabled system keyboard in gameplay.
-Fixed multiple bugs with animals that were stuck or invisible.
-Fixed rooms being treated as full too often.
-Removed forced advertisements.
-All types of animals for specific map are now available in every room on that map.

-Bug fixes.

- Day & night cycle with nocturnal animals.
- Improved reward sharing for killing prey with other players.
- Daily Quests now can have XP as a reward.
- Rewarded video offers for extra resources.
- Another batch of anti-cheat improvements.

- Quick Skill Selection
- 5 new skills
- Multiple bug fixes regarding skills
- Increased maximum player level to 70
- Decreased attribute prices and increased Health and Attack limit
- Combat Power - Indicator showing your wolfâ€™s strength
- New matchmaking for high level players based on Combat Power
- Anti-hack improvements
- Balance changes

- Mega Reward - unlock boost by completing daily quests.
- XP and points from all animals increased.
- Confirmation popup when purchasing points packs
- Small balance changes
- Anti-cheat improvements

- Mega Reward - unlock boost by completing daily quests.
- XP and points from all animals increased.
- Confirmation popup when purchasing points packs
- Small balance changes
- Anti-cheat improvements
- Bug fixes
Fixed false error message after successful purchase

- Packs: Chat with a group of friends and achieve higher ranks together
- Player Profile - look up information about yourself and other players
- Added last activity indicator in the Friends view
- Fixed Friend Message history getting lost
- Multiple bug fixes

Friends list is sorted by last active time
Player ID removed from friends list
Combat Power of other players hidden in PvP mode
New sounds for some skills
Multiple bug fixes

Friends list is sorted by last active time
Player ID removed from friends list
Combat Power of other players hidden in PvP mode
New sounds for some skills
Multiple bug fixes

- Tips and tricks on new loading screens
- Added Tutorial for new players
- Buying Mega Boost during gameplay will return you to the map automatically
- Mini Player Profile that opens after pressing a button over players' head
- Security improvements for collecting players CP in rankings
- Improved Scoreboard layout
- Thunderstorm shadow is less intense and it is now visible on grass
- Fixed bugs with Japanese language in game chat
- Fixed lagging players seen from long distances
- Multiple bug fixes and improvements

- Tips and tricks on new loading screens
- Added Tutorial for new players
- Buying Mega Boost during gameplay will return you to the map automatically
- Mini Player Profile that opens after pressing a button over players' head
- Security improvements for collecting players CP in rankings
- Improved Scoreboard layout
- Thunderstorm shadow is less intense and it is now visible on grass
- Fixed bugs with Japanese language in game chat
- Fixed lagging players seen from long distances
- Multiple bug fixes and improvements

- New player ranks
- Option to select player profile visibility
- Left-handed mode
- AFK players detection and kick system
- Bug fixes and minor improvements

- New player ranks
- Option to select player profile visibility
- Left-handed mode

- PvP downtime reimbursement
- fixed specific damage-over-time skills to calculate total damage correctly

- fixed specific problems with joining friends' games
